name: Turtle City (SYNTHIA_2000)
description:
A short walk through a surreal city on the back of a giant turtle, teeming with wildlife.

A walking simulator created for the Haunted PS1 2021 Summer of Shivers jam.

CONTENT WARNINGS: 

  • Cartoon/Pixelated Gore/Body Horror 
  • Flashing/Intense Lights/Visuals
  • Unreality

CONTROLS:

  • W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys to Move
  • Mouse to Look Around

CREDITS:

  • Some sounds courtesy of Freesound.org
  • Some textures courtesy of textures.com, pexels.com, ambientCG.com, pixabay.com, and cgbookcase.com
  • Voice clips taken from various 70's era PSAs
